title: Matching Puzzle Temple
description: Right now is an ideal opportunity to animate your brain in this fresh-out-of-the-box new game Matching Puzzle Temple. You really want to give the greatest consideration to each card you flip. You will catch probably the most troublesome levels you can find. Check it out and best of luck!
instructions: Use the mouse to play the game.

title: Farm Hidden Objects
description: This is a classic point and click hidden object game. You need to find all of the items listed in the picture on the left side of the screen. Complete the level before time runs out to get bonus points.
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Car Garage Differences
description: This is a Spot the difference type of photo puzzle game where players must find at least 5 differences between two otherwise similar images. You can use hints if you stuck in finding differences. Unused hints and saved time will be rewarded as hint bonus and time bonus points respectively.
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Smiling Glass 2
description: Smilling Glass 2 is a game in which you need to fill a glass with water. Fill the glass with water can be very dificult, you need avoid obstacles, spikes and more. FIll the specified amount of water in the glass to win the level.
instructions: Tap to screen.

title: Exit the Maze
description: A three-dimensional image of the maze will be seen on the screen in front of you. Your character will be in a certain place. You will also see the exit from the maze. You will have to move the ball to it. To do this, you need to be using the keys to turn the whole maze in space in the desired direction. As soon as the ball gets to the exit from the maze you will be given points and you will go to the next level of the game.
instructions: Use left and right arrow keys or touch the screen!

title: Get Color Fast
description: The center circle is spinning non-stop, choose the correct color and shoot. Match colors to earn points. Score as many points as you can. The game is simple and easy to play but challenging, don't be fooled by the simplicity.
instructions: Use your mouse to play the game or tap on the screen!

title: Falling Lovers
description: Falling Lovers is an interesting game for skills. Rotate the blocks that holds the player and drop the boyfriends to reach the love. Use the mouse or you finger to rotate the Block, you have to send the boyfriends to the right place. Have fun!
instructions: Click and drag to rotate the cups. Touch and drag to rotate the cups.

title: 1010 Golden Trophies
description: 1010 Golden Trophies" is an intriguing puzzle game where your objective is to gather all the trophy blocks on the board. To achieve this, you must complete the row or column containing the trophy block. To fill these rows or columns, select and place block sets from the left panel. You can continue placing block sets until there's no more space left, at which point the game will conclude. Challenge your puzzle-solving skills in this unique and engaging game!
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Monsters Memory
description: Click on a card to unveil the hidden Monster within. Sharpen your memory skills to match it with a similar Monster. Your mission: match all the cards on the board to conquer each level. Can you conquer all 15 levels and emerge victorious in this captivating game of memory and skill?
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Which Sea Creature Looks Different
description: Welcome to the exciting world of difference puzzles! You'll be presented with three images of enchanting sea creatures. Two of them are identical, but one stands out as different. Put your keen observation skills to the test and identify the unique sea creature in each set. Can you conquer all 30 challenges and prove your sharp eye in this thrilling game of distinctions? Dive in and find out!
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: City Blocks
description: City Blocks is a match-3 puzzle game. Strategically place new buildings and upgrade them to build the largest possible city before you run out of space.
instructions: Click on an empty tile to add a new building.

title: Huggy Wuggy Pop It Jigsaw
description: Huggy Wuggy Pop It Jigsaw is a free online game in the jigsaw puzzle genre. You have 6 images in three modes to play. Choose one of the modes for the game that you previously choose and start it to play. Drag and drop the pieces to solve the puzzle and create an image. Enjoy, and have fun!
instructions: Use mouse to play this game.

title: Colors Of Holi
description: "Colors of Holi" immerses you in the vibrant Indian festival of Holi. Choose a color-pot and transfer it to an empty tile. Strategically move the color-pots to create rows of 5 or more of the same color. Utilize power-ups to clear the board when it gets crowded. Keep playing until you have space for new color-pots on the board. Embrace the spirit of Holi in this engaging and colorful game!
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Puzzle Rotate Animals
description: Welcome to our newest casual puzzle game Puzzle Rotate - Animals. The game has 10 levels with different animals. Each level is locked and it will be unlocked when you solve the previous level. Build the correct image by rotating the pieces of the puzzle before time runs out. Tap or click on a piece to rotate. Enjoy and have fun!
instructions: Use the mouse to play this game.

title: Word Search Animals
description: Explore the fascinating world of animals in this captivating word search game. Challenge your word-finding skills as you hunt for animal names hidden within the grid. Can you spot them all and become a word search master?
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Bloxy Block Parkour
description: Bloxy Block Parkour is a fun skill online game that you can play for free on PC or any mobile device. No need to install it to play! In this game you need to menage challenging levels of parkour jumping? More mechanics and more platform twist awaits you. Are you ready? Have fun playing Bloxy Block Parkour game here and NOW!
instructions: Use arrow keys or WASD to move, Space to jump or right mouse click. On mobile tap on the buttons!

title: SuperHeroes Puzzle
description: SuperHeroes Puzzle is here. SuperHeroes Puzzle is a superhuman riddle game that will prod your cerebrum and work on your memory. Solve puzzles highlighting your most loved superheroes from games, films, comics and try to get the best score.
instructions: Use the mouse to play the game.

title: Cats Rotate
description: “Cats Rotate” is a casual puzzle game. Build the correct cat image by rotating the pieces of the puzzle before time runs out. Tap or click on a piece to rotate and have fun!
instructions: Touch any piece to rotate.

title: Idiom Hunt
description: The objective of Idiom Hunt is to pass as many level as possible by collecting words in the correct order to complete the idiomatic expressions. To collect a word, you must jump all the way into it. The words will appear at the top of the screen as you collect them. The given words, all the words that make up the idiomatic phrase displayed randomly, are shown at the bottom of the screen. The description, the meaning of the phrase, is shown at the bottom as well.
instructions: Figure out the correct order of words as you hunt down idioms while eluding dangers.

title: Wake Up the Box 2
description: The boxes are back, and once again sleeping! Find ways to wake them up by placing objects on the playfield. It is not rude to wake up someone if it is just a box!
instructions: Use your mouse. Space – restart level.

title: Liquid 2
description: Liquid 2 is a atmospheric game in which we have to guide water drops to the finish. To do so we use the “arrow keys” to rotate the playing field which will decide the direction of the water flow. The graphics style is pretty cool and the music is relaxing. In total there are 27 levels in 3 worlds with extra drops and some traps on the way.
instructions: LEFT and RIGHT or A-D – rotate world M – mute R – restart SPACE – go to next level when you on finish

title: Sieger 2 Level Pack
description: You as a Siege commander have to kill all the castle defenders and save the peaceful peasants by carefully choosing what supporting blocks of the castle to smash. Take the castle in less shots to earn the medals: Clear, Decisive and Brilliant Victory. Loot treasure chests for extra score! The fewer shots the better.
instructions: Point a castle block and click to fire.

title: Linez!
description: Linez! an interesting match 3 games. Have you experienced the match3 games with different gameplay? The rules are simple, move the matching symbols to make the pattern that makes a line. Select and match the symbols as soon as possible and clear the board. Win the game and challenge your friends.
instructions: mouse/touchscreen

title: Destroy Blocks
description: Destroy Blocks is an arcade game where obviously you need to destroy blocks. The blocks will be in two different colors, blue and red. The blocks will fall from the top of the game and at the bottom will be a ball that you need to shoot at the blocks. You can destroy a block with the ball if the colors will match. So you need to shoot on the blue block with the blue ball and at the red block with the red block. The blocks will change very fast and you need to change the ball color too.
instructions: Tap on the screen to play this game.

title: Blockz!
description: Enjoy a classic block puzzle game! What is the best way to kill some time? Sure thing is to train you logic and planning skills! And this game is perfect way to learn something new while having fun!
instructions: Break certain amount of lines each level to pass it! Rotate and move blocks and

title: Well Sudoku
description: Well Sudoku is for all players : from beginners to advanced players. If you like easy sudoku where you can have fun, enjoy, relax and pass your free time in a pleasant way you will love this game. If you like to raise big sudoku challenges and make your brain work hard, this classic sudoku game is also perfect for you. It's time to get a gaming break and to relax with our free sudoku.
instructions: Sudoku is a challenging logic game, so there are four difficulty modes from easy to expert to suit your experience level. Along with the difficulty settings, you can also add notes to mark squares, erase your numbers, and undo your previous move.

title: Jewel Blocks Quest
description: Test your logic skills in this complex arcade puzzle. Play an infinite number of levels in a mystical environment and beat your score. Easy and fun! Try out all unique game features.
instructions: Slide the block shapes into the grid and create rows or columns to remove them. After 10 successful moves, your undo feature charges up.

title: Screw the Nut 2
description: Who will become the best nut screwer-man? Let’s find out! Screw the Nut 2 is a physics-based puzzle game. Tap on objects to remove them, and help the nut reach the bolt to complete each level.
instructions: Move the nut to the bolt by clicking on the elements and making them disappear.

title: Tangled Gardens
description: We do not know when or how plants obtain nutrients. But you will agree that this is very interesting! We now have a unique opportunity to peek behind them, in fact by the flow of water to lay their makeup. Develop your strategic abilities: the longer the water line, the more points you get. Better planning and response, solving puzzles in the shortest time and get bonuses.
instructions: mouse/touchscreen

title: Screw the Nut 3
description: Explore the seabed and tighten the nut. Screw the Nut 3 is an underwater-themed physics-based puzzle game. In a nutshell, help the screw and the nut make one piece — and don't screw up while doing it!
instructions: mouse/touchscreen

title: NoNoSparks Genesis
description: Be part of the genesis! The goal of the game is to create a complete world step by step, including flora, fauna, humans and even dinosaurs, through solving logical puzzles based on nonograms. The beautiful and humorous graphics and characters offer a charming appeal. The unique reward-mechanic and the tried-and-tested, addictive puzzle gameplay create a flow that invites you back to yet another and another playing session. Have fun!
instructions: - can be played entirely by using the mouse only - additionally you may PRESS & HOLD the space key to toggle between placing a block or an empty mark.

title: Blocks 2
description: “Blocks 2” is a logic puzzle game with 60 levels to twist your brain. Move the blocks in one line to make them disappear until any block is left on the level. This game is a real challenge for your mind!
instructions: mouse/touchscreen

title: Atomic Puzzle 2
description: Clear each level by removing the atoms in the correct order. Can you predict the merging of the molecules so that there’s none left at the end of each level?
instructions: Use mouse to select combination of atoms. 1.The colour of the atom you click on does not matter. 2.Each combination must contain the same coloured atoms. 3.Only one atom can be left unpaired in each combination.

title: Unstable Squares
description: The goal of this puzzle game is to move the white ball between two points who is on the top and of the bottom on the game screen. Between points from the left and right side are a lot of squares that are unstable and they move all around without course. So, move the white ball to the points without collision with squares. Do that more times as you can and earn points. If you hit some of the squares the game will be over. Tap on the screen to control the ball. The ball will move up and down and you can control the movement to be short or long.
instructions: Tap on the screen to play

title: Atomic Puzzle
description: Atomic Puzzle is a new type of puzzle game focused on the logic of removing Atoms in the right order. Can you predict the merging of the molecules so that there’s none left at the end of each level? FEATURES: 50 levels 10+ different types of Atoms
instructions: Mouse/Touchscreen to play. Instructions are in-game.

title: Rope Draw
description: Rope draw is a puzzle game in wich you will push ropes to make new arrangements with them. Your objective is to copy the arrangement that will appear above. If needed, there is a hint button that will show you the first moves. There are 120 different levels and the 'Fun' mode (unlocked after beating level 40), in which you can insert new ropes or even push them as you wish.
instructions: Touch in the ropes to make new arrangements

title: Basket Puzzle!
description: New basketball puzzle with lots of physical elements. Use fans, trampolines, conveyors to throw the basketball into the basket. Just drag and drop elements anywhere and start the simulation. Many interesting levels are waiting for you.
instructions: You need put the ball to the basket, with help of objects in scene. Drag objects to the scene for level complete. Click Play button to watch your progress.

title: I'm not a Monster: Wanna Live
description: Have you ever felt curious about Huggy Wuggy history before becoming so vengeful in an abandoned toy factory? Let's find out and save our beloved friend. Based on a theory about Poppy Animation, this game tells you a story about the adventure of a girl to rescue her childhood toy - Huggy Wuggy. You will play the role of that girl and complete all the tricky level games. At the beginning of the chapter, Huggy is seen contained within a glass case. Huggy Wuggy just needs your hug. He is not a monster. Try to give him your warm hand and bring him alive.
instructions: I'm Not A Monster - HOW TO PLAY Follow the guideline to open Huggy's case. Use your brain IQ to identify the rule. Take advantage of the GrabPack magic backpack during Poppy Playtime. Use Blue Hand and Red Hand to hack electrical circuits or grab anything from afar.

title: Numberz!
description: Enjoy a math puzzle game for all players. The 2-player game can help kids and adults learn to count fast, as you try to solve the brainteaser quicker than your opponent. Highlight the chain of digits to make the required number, and thus paint the tiles white. Join great mathematical adventure and train your logic with the progressively challenging Math puzzles!
instructions: mouse/touchscreen

title: Atomic Puzzle XMas
description: Atomic Puzzle in Christmas style now! Clear each level by removing the atoms in the correct order. Can you predict the merging of the molecules so that there’s none left at the end of each level?
instructions: Use mouse to select combination of atoms. 1. The colour of the atom you click on does not matter. 2. Each combination must contain the same coloured atoms. 3. Only one atom can be left unpaired in each combination.

title: Cheat Death
description: Cheat Death is a brain-teasing game in which you need to correctly place all the blocks so that the man can drink the immortality elixir! Enjoy unique atmosphere and level-design!
instructions: Fill in a marked area with the figures. Controls – mouse.

title: Blocky Roads Online
description: Have fun with this exclusive new game Blocky Roads Online an entertaining game in kiz10 drive your vehicle and take it to the finish line in each level! You can play it for free at kiz10.com totally free, collect all the objects on the farm by controlling and improving your vehicle. Get in your car and discover green hills, snowy mountains and desert dunes in this unique physics racing game! The tornado destroyed your farm, you need to recover all the items to build the farm again. Enjoy multiple missions like time trial, cargo delivery, zombie killing and many others. Collect coins to upgrade cars and improve power, speed and other things.
instructions: Instructions: Use the mouse to drive or touch the screen to play on mobile devices.

title: Loving Couple Jigsaw
description: Loving Couple Jigsaw is a free online game in the jigsaw puzzle genre. You have 6 images in Valentine's theme in three modes to play. Choose one of the modes for the game that you previously choose and start it to play. Drag and drop the pieces to solve the puzzle and create an image. Enjoy, and have fun!
instructions: Use the mouse to play this game.

title: Blocks
description: BLOCKS is a logic puzzle game with 100 levels to twist your brain. Move the blocks in one line to make them disappear until any block is left on the level. This game is a real challenge for your mind!
instructions: Move the blocks in one line to make them disappear until any block is left on the level. “R” – Restart Level “E” – Undo Last Action “S” – Sound “M” – Music “Esc” – Menu Also playable on mobile with touchscreen!

title: Sugar Tales
description: Join Zila and her friends in their epic adventure through a world full of cakes. Move your monster through sugary cake challenges in this delicious and addictive puzzle adventure.
instructions: Select group of cakes that directly next to your monster.

title: Splitter
description: In Splitter, each level can be solved in a number of different ways. Will you be able to come up with a brand new solution? Split the boxes and find out! Your goal is to reach the brown exit, and preferrably collect the star(s) on the way. You do this by splitting certain objects and let gravity do its thing.
instructions: CLICK and DRAG to split the material in the way you wish. You can split joints and wood objects, but not metal and brick objects.

title: Wake the Royalty
description: Everyone is sleeping in the kingdom. Wake up all the royal family! A royal sequel to Wake Up the Box. Attach parts to wood objects to affect their distribution of mass and wake up the sleepy boxes.
instructions: Use your mouse. Space – restart a level.

title: Brickz!
description: Enjoy classic brick-puzzle! Have fun challenging dozens of levels in a unique classic brainteaser! Beat your scores and have fun! Train your logic while relaxing!
instructions: mouse/touchscreen

title: Dicez!
description: Dicez! - Cool arcade game with AI opponent, in this game you need to roll dice and choose positions, to collect game points and defeat your opponent. You can choose dice that have a higher number, and roll others. This game is for relaxation and interesting gameplay in board games.
instructions: mouse/touchscreen

title: Coinz!
description: Exchange rate excitement! Clear the stage of valuable coins by exchanging them with less valuable lucre in this mint puzzle game! Select a coin of greater value and match its value with several of the coins of lesser value to clear the coin!
instructions: Clear the field quickly for the highest score. International monetary concerns have never been this exciting! - Coinz!
